name: resurrecting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
resurrect
to bring someone back to life: Almost all Christians believe that Jesus was resurrected from the dead.
to bring back something into use or existence that had disappeared or ended: Several members of the party have resurrected the idea of constitutional change. She has been busily trying to resurrect her Hollywood career.
